page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content: The area is well served with parks, there being,{Coronation Park}which has tennis courts, a large grass area, childrens play equipment and a wooded walk{.Glen Howe Park}which is mainly a picturesque wooded area and the newly constructed{Sensicall Park}which is a nature trail.The village has a cricket pitch which is used during the season by members of the club and the visiting team. There are public footpaths throughout the area, which especially to the west of the Don is one of outstanding beauty.
